Articles.Content: Hey I'm new to mods for KSP and I've downloaded two mods; KAS and KIS and when I go to use them, the game says that there are files missing such as sound files and textures, for example, there is a fuel port that is used to connect to another ship to transfer fuel, but when I launch my ship, it says that the texture for the pipe is not in the file, but when I go look for it, it is in the texture file, its the same with the sound files and I have no idea what to do. Anyone have any ideas?
I guess you did not install the mod properly. Where did you install it ?
